xediaDhcpMIB.name: xediaDhcpMIB
xediaDhcpMIB.description: This module defines additional objects for management of DHCP support in Xedia devices.

xdhcpRelayMode.name: xdhcpRelayMode
xdhcpRelayMode.description: The Administrative mode to control DHCP relay functions.

xdhcpRelayMaxHops.name: xdhcpRelayMaxHops
xdhcpRelayMaxHops.description: This value identifies the maximum number of hops allowed for requests passing through this relay agent. Packets received with a hop count greater than this value will be discarded.

xdhcpRelayIncludeCircuitID.name: xdhcpRelayIncludeCircuitID
xdhcpRelayIncludeCircuitID.description: Whether the relay agent should add the circuit ID of the ATM or frame relay circuit that a DHCP relay request was received to the DHCP relay request. The circuit ID will be added as a agent circuit ID sub-option of a DHCP relay agent information option (option 82) and will be used by the relay agent to forward the reply to the correct circuit.

xdhcpRelayDestTable.name: xdhcpRelayDestTable
xdhcpRelayDestTable.description: A table of DHCP server destinations that the DHCP relay agent will will relay requests to and responses from.

xdhcpRelayDestEntry.name: xdhcpRelayDestEntry
xdhcpRelayDestEntry.description: Information about a single DHCP server.

xdhcpRelayDestIndex.name: xdhcpRelayDestIndex
xdhcpRelayDestIndex.description: A number uniquely identifying each DHCP server that the DHCP relay agent will relay requests to and responses from.

xdhcpRelayDestination.name: xdhcpRelayDestination
xdhcpRelayDestination.description: The destination to which DHCP requests will be sent. It may be a specific server IP address, a local IP subnet on which requests will be broadcast, or an IP server name to be resolved through a DNS lookup.

xdhcpRelayDestOperAddress.name: xdhcpRelayDestOperAddress
xdhcpRelayDestOperAddress.description: The operational IP address for this server destination. It will either be the configured IP address or the resolved address if a server name was specified in xdhcpRelayDestination.

xdhcpRelayDestRequests.name: xdhcpRelayDestRequests
xdhcpRelayDestRequests.description: The number of DHCP requests that were received on this interface.

xdhcpRelayDestReplies.name: xdhcpRelayDestReplies
xdhcpRelayDestReplies.description: The number of DHCP replies that were received on this interface.

xdhcpRelayDestProtocol.name: xdhcpRelayDestProtocol
xdhcpRelayDestProtocol.description: The protocol(s) to be relayed to this destination.

xdhcpRelayDestRowStatus.name: xdhcpRelayDestRowStatus
xdhcpRelayDestRowStatus.description: This variable displays the status of the entry. Setting it to 'destroy' marks the entry as removed. Eventually, when no other applications depend on that particular resource, it will be completely removed from the table. Setting it to either 'create', or 'active' will add a row to the table.

xdhcpRelayDestInterface.name: xdhcpRelayDestInterface
xdhcpRelayDestInterface.description: The name of the IP interface over which the DHCP relay destination will be attempted. A value of 'all' represents all IP interfaces.

xdhcpCompliance.name: xdhcpCompliance
xdhcpCompliance.description: The compliance statement for all agents that support this MIB. A compliant agent implements all objects defined in this MIB.

xdhcpAllGroup.name: xdhcpAllGroup
xdhcpAllGroup.description: The set of all accessible objects in this MIB.
